enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve retrieving collections associated with keys, making them suitable for setting up the test environment.
The put method can be used to populate the map with key-value pairs, which is necessary for testing the containsValue method.
Clearing the map before testing the containsValue method ensures a clean state, which is crucial for reliable test results.
Removing specific mappings can be used to test the behavior of containsValue when certain values are not present.
